text: I’ve got a project i’m working on with multiple modules (which, themselves, do not depend on one another), but they all logically fit together.  I would like to keep them all in the same `MyProject/src` folder (which I obviously can), but I can’t figure out how to write my `Project.toml` that will allow me to call `using` on these modules from within the environment for the overarching project.  Any tips?

I'm not sure this is 100% correct, but I did `generate` inside the directory of the main project and then did `] dev --local "MySubTest"`

I could use the sub-test from `using`.

I guess a downside is that you don't have a single Project.toml for all packages, but this seems like a solid solution.
